Example Assessment of Key COVID-19-Related Symptoms 99 Given the heterogeneous nature of COVID-19-related symptoms, key COVID-19-related 101 symptoms should be assessed systematically to provide an accurate evaluation of benefit in 102 outpatients. In this guidance we provide an exemplary set of 14 common COVID-19-related 103 symptoms to consider in Table 1 (as described below).
